data.actual_result: Client Freezes, Can't Close Canary, Gets JavaScript Error
data.expected_result: The video should load in full screen just fine
data.short_description: Some YouTube videos crash client while in full screen.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a YouTube video *some might not work* The attached one is a perfect example - Hit Play - Go Fullscreen - wait as client freezes - try to quit canary - wait for javascript error - hit ok - client has the video as fullscreen after hitting ok - hit esc to get out of video - client finally closes
